item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: The development paves the way for the next phase of US President Donald Trump's peace plan to get under way.

item.title: Spain slashes speed limit on popular train route after fault found
item.description: The discovery of a crack on the Madrid-Barcelona line follows two recent deadly crashes in the country.

item.title: EU investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
item.description: The Commission will assess whether "manipulated sexually explicit images" have been shown to users in the EU.

item.title: Kenya's ex-deputy president alleges assassination attempt in church attack
item.description: The interior minister condemned the attack, which police say they are investigating.

item.title: Greece biscuit factory fire leaves at least four dead
item.description: A search is continuing for one person still missing after a blaze broke out at a biscuit factory near the city of Trikala.
